Refund Policy

Last Updated: October 2, 2025

1. Introduction

LaunchPad Market understands that sometimes purchases don't work out as planned. This Refund Policy outlines the circumstances under which refunds may be issued for purchases made through our platform.

2. Crowdfunding Pre-Orders

Before Project Funding Deadline

If you have backed a project through a pre-order but the project has not yet reached its funding deadline:

  • You may cancel your pre-order at any time before the project reaches its funding deadline
  • Full refunds will be issued for cancelled pre-orders
  • To cancel, please contact our support team at support@launchpadmarket.com

After Project Funding Success

If you have backed a project that successfully reaches its funding goal:

  • Your payment is authorized but not charged until the project is successfully funded
  • If you wish to cancel after funding success but before product shipment, please contact us within 48 hours of funding completion
  • Refunds may be subject to a processing fee

After Project Funding Failure

If a project fails to reach its funding goal:

  • No charges are made to backers
  • Authorized payments are automatically cancelled
  • No action is required from backers

3. Marketplace Purchases

Standard Refund Policy

For products purchased in our marketplace:

  • You may request a refund within 30 days of delivery
  • Items must be in new, unused condition with all original packaging
  • Refunds will be issued to the original payment method
  • Return shipping costs are the responsibility of the customer

Damaged or Defective Items

If you receive a damaged or defective item:

  • Contact us within 7 days of delivery
  • Provide photos of the damage or defect
  • We will arrange for a replacement or full refund
  • Return shipping costs will be covered by LaunchPad Market

Digital Products

For digital products:

  • Refunds are only available if the product is not as described
  • No refunds are available for digital products that have been downloaded
  • Contact us within 14 days of purchase for digital product issues

4. Creator-Initiated Refunds

Creators may offer their own refund policies for their products. In such cases:

  • Creator refund policies must comply with our platform standards
  • Customers may be eligible for refunds under either the creator's policy or our standard policy, whichever is more favorable
  • LaunchPad Market may mediate disputes between creators and backers

5. Non-Refundable Items

The following items are generally not eligible for refunds:

  • Custom or personalized items that have been produced
  • Perishable goods
  • Gift cards
  • Downloaded software or digital content
  • Items sold as-is or final sale

6. Refund Process

To request a refund:

  1. Contact our support team at refunds@launchpadmarket.com
  2. Provide your order number and reason for refund
  3. Include any relevant documentation or photos
  4. Our team will review your request within 3-5 business days
  5. If approved, you will receive instructions for returning items (if applicable)
  6. Refunds are processed within 7-14 business days after approval

7. Disputed Refunds

If there is a dispute regarding a refund request:

  • Both parties will be contacted to gather additional information
  • LaunchPad Market reserves the right to make the final decision
  • Our decision is based on our Terms of Service and this Refund Policy
  • Users may appeal decisions through our formal dispute resolution process

8. Changes to This Refund Policy

We reserve the right to modify this refund policy at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to our website.

9. Contact Information

For questions about refunds or to initiate a refund request, please contact us at refunds@launchpadmarket.com.
